price: 40 Nous l’avons alors saisi, lui et ses armées, et les avons engloutis sous les eaux. Considère donc quelle fut la fin des impies.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-ẓālimīna
